TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but nothing is compatible with it. Not. A. Single. Program!

I wish I could program

(@vexx32: hats off mate, great corruption of a nonexistent wish)

Granted, but a serious bug in your program causes your computer to melt down.

I wish it wasn't too late to add a wish to my last post

Granted, but your wish was to melt in the heart of a volcano. Quasi-paradox!

I wish that all cell phone plans were free, just like how some TV stations are free.

Granted, Verizon Wireless goes bankrupt; happy now?

I wish for chocolate rain

Granted, ultimate chaos then happen (do you've been thinking of what I'm currently thinkin of?)

I wish for a un-poissoned tea
granted, but the cup's poisoned (to the touch). I wish that the person who grants my wish sees this

Granted now everyone speaks this way

I wish for a way not to cheat sci points when im desperate

Granted, but it gives very little science. It also requires destroying whole ships.

I wish that people would post full posts in this game, not forgetting to corrupts someone wish, or forgetting to make a wish

Granted. A person, unfortunately named "People," now posts in this thread.

I wish for a spoon that is slightly bent.

Granted, but all else you eat for breakfast is poisoned.

I wish for a wish

Granted, but it becomes a self-inflicted curse of the worst kind.

I wish for some sleeeeeeeeep.

Granted. It's in the form of a life-long coma.

I wish this wish gets corrupted.

Granted, but your computer is corrupted as well

I wis for a trip to amsterdam

Granted. But your bus breaks down and you have to walk home, during a blizzard.

I wish for a robotic minion.

Granted. It's a roomba.

I wish for a robotic minion which is fully loyal to me that I can order to kill moderators on this forum (So I can bribe them)

Granted. The mods rebel against you and use the unholy power of the Banhammer to destroy it, and you.

I wish for another forum purge.

Granted, every acount with a mudkip is deleted, and only them.

I wish Vexx32's next wish corruption didn't involve the killing, maiming, disfiguring, or any other bodily, emotional or mental harm on wisher.

Granted his next wish will be way worse than all of that combined

I wish for pork rinds to rain instead of snow

Granted, but the smell outside becomes unbearable a few days after every "snow"

I wish that admins could stop being so abusive.

*gasp* You dare defy the absolute and just authority of the mods?!?!?!

Granted. they are even more abusive.

I wish for a minor infraction.

Granted, but we grind you to a pulp as well for daring to anger the gods.

I wish people would quit tempting fate

Granted. Now they aren't tempting anything. Even breathing

I wish for a soul

Granted, but it's a ginger's.

I wish for [REDACTED INFORMATION]

Granted. In the end, the meaning of life is *ERROR CODE 55340. PLEASE CONTACT SUPPORT FOR MORE INFORMATION*

I wish for this steam purchase to stop being stupid

Granted. Every other purchase you make is now stupid.

I wish i can haz cheezburger.
